The court had a brief status hearing at 4:50 PM EDT (an hour ago as I write this,) and as of then she had not been released.  https://bsky.app/profile/annabower.bsky.social/post/3lorehk5qes2v  **EDIT:** She was [released for real](https://www.nbcboston.com/news/local/bail-hearing-tufts-student-rumeysa-ozturk-detained-in-louisiana/3708999/?at) shortly after I posted this comment.
